page.title: 08RECREATION IN BUCHANAN
page.content: In this community (which covers the parish of Buchanan ) there are lots of activities, fishing,sailing,bingo, curling and bowls. {Fishing}is a popular activity. Only a couple of people go fishing. {Sailing}is another popular activity. There are a lot of young people in the Milton who sail. {Bingo}is held in a hall in Drymen. Adults and children go as it is a family night out. The bingo is only held once a month in the winter time. {Curling}goes on in the winter (when there is a frozen pond in the Drymen show field). There is a trophy to be won every 12 months. {Bowls}takes place in the Memorial Hall beside Buchanan primary school.
